@SPI @CheckReturnValue @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package io.spine.server.storage

This package provides interfaces and base classes for storages.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ColumnMapping<R>
    The value mapping rules of record columns.
    ColumnTypeMapping<T,R>
    A persistence strategy of an entity column.
    MessageRecordSpec.ExtractId<R extends com.google.protobuf.Message,I>
    A method object to extract the value of an record identifier given an instance of a record.
    Storage<I,M extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    The base interface for storages.
    StorageFactory
    A factory for creating storages used by repositories, EventStore and Delivery.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractColumnMapping<R>
    The base implementation of mapping rules for the column values of a stored record.
    AbstractStorage<I,M extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    Abstract base for storages.
    DefaultColumnMapping
    A default column mapping which stores all values "as-is".
    MessageRecordSpec<I,R extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    Instructs storage implementations on how to store a plain Protobuf message as a storage record.
    MessageStorage<I,M extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    A storage which allows persisting the Messages as storage records.
    QueryConverter
    Converts the queries defined in Protobuf into the language of io.spine.query package.
    RecordSpec<I,R,S>
    Defines the specification of a record in a storage.
    RecordStorage<I,R extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    An abstract base for storage implementations, which store the Protobuf messages as records.
    RecordStorageDelegate<I,R extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    A RecordStorage which delegates all of its operations to another instance of RecordStorage.
    RecordWithColumns<I,R extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    A value of some message record along with the values of its columns.

Package io.spine.server.storage Description

This package provides interfaces and base classes for storages.
